column2: Greatness is achieved by constant and unyielding focus. I shall focus my attention and efforts on...
We have accomplished everything possible in our current focus on [lmmpvf_GetFactionFocus]. It is time to rest, think, plan and wait until more opportunities present themselves.

The glory of my house and my name is of paramount importance and definitely comes before everything else! The bards shall sing of my house's accomplishments. All that remains is to choose a goal to focus on for the time being.

No realm can survive for long without a consistent focus on its prosperity - for prosperity does not come of its own accord but rather only as the sweet fruit of continuous labors. With my efforts the realm shall flourish! Now is the time to choose a goal for the next few years.

Nothing material can gain more importance in my heart because it is full of the desire to serve the true faith. I believe [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] shall accept my efforts and guide my choice for the best goal in the faith's service.
Convert a Province to the [Root.Religion.GetName] Faith
